name: Shotgun Slime
description:
What would happen if the lowest of the dungeon creatures found a shotgun? I don't know, but this is my best guess at what it would look like. Dodge and soar through the air to make it out of the dungeon as quickly as possible while finding all the secret treasure on the way! Post your times online and compete with others!

(This game was made for Major Jam 3: Retro! The limitation was a 96x96 resolution.)
